attributes.action: Put a stop to immigration and claiming asylum.. Close the doors!!!
attributes.additional_details:
We are bursting at the seams and already have a lot of homeless.. Including homeless veterans.
Charity always starts at home.  We are giving way to much out to illegal immigrants then letting them claim Asylum??
We are a giving country, but it is time to sort our own problems out first instead of increasing these problems. 
Our homes and help need to be given to people already in this country.  We are a small country with no more room.
Vet visitors also to see who they are visiting and how long
attributes.background: It is time we stop funding on immigration.. We are putting an Australian points system in place.. But it is not tackling illegal immigration and the UK is getting fed up with it.. It is time to close our doors as we are bursting at the seams.. Stop the boats before they set off.  NO TO IMMIGRATION

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321862

You might be interested to know 'illegal immigrants' aren't entitled to benefits. You can find out more here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/sn05621/
